short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can see YouTube and Facebook videos direct from Yelp's page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube and Facebook videos direct into Yelp pages

We extract business' geolocation getting a Yelp page's metadata inserted into HTML and with this information we fetch (up to 50) YouTube videos geotagged nearby (250 meters). Very simple and useful.  Or in Facebook case, we search for a page using the Facebook's Graph API. If we find a page, we fetch all videos from it.
